title: The Beast Is Back!  Phanteks  Enthoo LUXE 2
description: Phanteks is bringing back their LUXE 2 case and this might be one of their most extreme cases yet.    A special thanks to all of our sponsors:  Phanteks MSI Razer Corsair Thermaltake  As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Main 4K Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second 4K Camera -  $700 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #phanteksluxe2 #ces2019 #hardwarecanucks #pccase #gamingcase
